alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 01 at 9:05PM PST until January 02 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Priest River, Potlatch, Coulee City, Rosalia, Chewelah, Flowery Trail Road, Northport, Metaline Falls, Grand Coulee, Ritzville, Uniontown, Bonners Ferry, Genesee, Kettle Falls, La Crosse, Eastport, Tiger, Clark Fork, Tekoa, Creston, Metaline, Moscow, Deer Park, Ione, Colville, Wilbur, Oakesdale, Odessa, Newport, Athol, Plummer, Pullman, Springdale-Hunters Road, Orin-Rice Road, Colfax, Fruitland, Sandpoint, Schweitzer Mountain Road, and Harrington. * WHEN...Until noon PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Mountains; Upper Columbia Basin; Washington Palouse
